Title: Chapter 62
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Kenneth Lin, Tian Jun Gu (staff writer)
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Campbell Scott
Plot: The Underwoods and their team angle to undermine the revived committee investigating Frank. Hammerschmidt's investigation heats up.
